resources.string: This app is currently invitation-only, so to request access, simply enrol with your email ID.
Email and Confirm Email do not match
Name should have at least 3 characters.
Please look for an invitation email in your inbox. Also, you can always decline the invitation if your plans have changed.
Are you sure you want to cancel the invitation?
Unexpected error occurred. We are working on it.
Something technically is wrong. We are working on it.
Oops! Something went wrong on the server. We are working on it.
